meanings.definition: The quality of being friendly, cheerful, and pleasant.
meanings.sent1: Her geniality always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The party was filled with geniality and laughter.
meanings.sent3: His geniality was so contagious that even grumpy old Mr. Johnson couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The geniality of the small town was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The geniality of the host made everyone feel welcome and at ease.

meanings.definition: A friendly and cheerful atmosphere or disposition.
meanings.sent1: The geniality of the office made it a pleasant place to work.
meanings.sent2: The geniality between the neighbors made the street feel like a big family.
meanings.sent3: The geniality of the puppy was evident in its wagging tail and playful barks.
meanings.sent4: The geniality of the park on a sunny day was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The geniality of the teacher created a positive learning environment for the students.
